original_definition: 'air-vented tumble drier' means a tumble drier that draws in fresh air, passes it over the textiles and vents the resulting moist air into the room or outside;
generated_definition: 'air-vented tumble drier' means a machine that uses hot air to dry clothes through tumbling motion, typically vented to remove excess moisture.
